channel.title: A few questions
channel.description:
Yeah, just a few.. If you can answer ANY of them, I'd appreciate it.
First ... Any idea how to stop NPCs from walking directly through objects? Because on most bases, when you've ranged or maged an NPC, they'll walk right through objects to get to you.
Second ... Any idea how to fix my computer? For the past while I've been unable to log into other no-ip servers. I'm surprised that I am still able to log into Hamachi servers.
Anyways, I'll think of more questions when I find something I don't know how to fix, or something like that. Thanks

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:4, topic:151044”][quote author=dog eats dog link=topic=206655.msg1817381#msg1817381 date=1192168939]

Second … Any idea how to fix my computer? For the past while I’ve been unable to log into other no-ip servers. I’m surprised that I am still able to log into Hamachi servers.

This happened to me, But i didn’t fixed it. After awhile of not playing any server it worked again, Try not opening moparscape or a client you have for say 3 days to a week, And see if it fixes your problem, If not sorry, And sorry for not being more helpful.
[/quote]

True, happened to me before, try that.

As for your first problem i think Newb 2341 posted a tutorial on invisible walls? I think that would kinda help, but it would be very hard due to random objects being in the way, and unaccurate X’s and Y’s. But if its a open field, then yeah that would work.[/quote]

Well I need a real fix, not a quick fix :\ And, thanks for the “idea” on how to connect to other servers.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“dog eats dog, post:2, topic:151044”][quote author=Aff link=topic=206655.msg1817300#msg1817300 date=1192166624]
Second … Any idea how to fix my computer? For the past while I’ve been unable to log into other no-ip servers. I’m surprised that I am still able to log into Hamachi servers.
[/quote]

This happened to me, But i didn’t fixed it. After awhile of not playing any server it worked again, Try not opening moparscape or a client you have for say 3 days to a week, And see if it fixes your problem, If not sorry, And sorry for not being more helpful.[/quote]

True, happened to me before, try that.

As for your first problem i think Newb 2341 posted a tutorial on invisible walls? I think that would kinda help, but it would be very hard due to random objects being in the way, and unaccurate X’s and Y’s. But if its a open field, then yeah that would work.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

Yeah, that’s what happens to me… (If I don’t open Moarscape, etc for a while I can log on after) But if I don’t open it for 3 days I’ll go insane.

Read full topic
